name: lbs-youtube-processor
description: Lambda function to process YouTube video transcripts for LeadBotStudio knowledge base

scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc && npm run install-prod && npm run zip
scripts.deploy: npm run build && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name lbs-youtube-processor --zip-file fileb://youtube-processor.zip
scripts.create: npm run build && aws lambda create-function --function-name lbs-youtube-processor --runtime nodejs22.x --role $LAMBDA_ROLE_ARN --handler index.handler --zip-file fileb://youtube-processor.zip --timeout 900 --memory-size 1024
